page.title: 09RESIDENTS - OCCUPATIONS
page.content: In our survey we asked Harrold residents for their main occupations. A complete cross-section of types of employment was represented in our findings. As predicted many of our sample were managers, administrators,accountants and other similar occupations.Teachers and lecturers were also represented in our survey. The local leatherworks and Bridgman's, manufacturing fire-doors,employed several people, either as operatives or as foremen. Surprisingly in a country community none of the people surveyed were farm managers or farm-workers.
